body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     Stories               Stories        Cora Weir reading in her bedroom. NPS       The landscape and skies around Weir Farm National Historic Site have inspired artists for more than 130 years. While their artwork is evidence of the park's visual appeal, these written stories manage to comprise an in-depth and perhaps more insightful look at what makes this place so inspiring. Read contemporary accounts by visitors, and historic letters by people that called Weir Farm National Historic Site home.           Blogs Read contemporary accounts of the inspiration felt by the interns at Weir Farm National Historic Site.           Letters Read selected letters from Weir's time at the farm to discover snapshots of America's agricultural, artistic and cultural history.
title: Weir Farm National Historic Site: Stories
